item.description:
WELCOME LIGHT; farewell DARKNESS


YOU ARE INVITED.....
To welcome in the Spring at the
FIRST Annual
Beltaine Celebration at
Wolf Hill Grove!

Saturday, May 3rd- Beginning at 2pm

At the Paladino's in Hubbardston, Mass


$10 Per Person to cover food

For a Beltaine Ritual, Maypole Ceremony, The Finest Feast and, The Biggest Bonfire, and The Burning of the Biggest Wicker-Man to date!

Come and join in this time of Hope & Thankfulness :)
Tentative Schedule of Events:

2:00- 3:00 Meet & Greet
Appetizers:
Chips & Dip
Homemade veggie platter
Cheese & Cracker Plate
Ribbon Tree Wishes

3:00- 3:30 Ritual Preparation & Talk

3:30- 4:00 Maypole Erecting Ceremony

4:00- 5:00 Beltaine Ritual

5:00-6:00 Maypole Dance
Maypole Vows
Blessings
Thread the Needle

6:00-7:00 Beltaine Feast
B-B-Que Chicken
Hamburgers
Cheeseburgers
Hot Dogs
Homemade Potato Salad
Homemade Macaroni Salad
Homemade Green Salad
Rolls w/butter

Dessert:
Raspberry/Choc Cheesecake Squares
Choc/ Peanutbutter Cheesecake Squares
Strawberry Shortcake
Ice cream sundaes

7:00~~~~

Wicker Man Ceremony
Chanting
Bonfire

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Some considerations:

~Please park across the street at Martin Tool-
Please be quiet, and respectful- and do not litter.
This has been a place for years, that we have
been free to park at, but new owners have recently taken over, and we do not want to give them reason to take away our parking privileges for gatherings.

~All food will be provided, a $10 donation is
requested at the door, which can be given to the greeters. It is a BYOB event. There is a package store in the center of town if needed, please note that it closes at 9pm.

~Dress in whatever you like- Please dress light, as it may be warm, and dress comfortable, Flowered headpieces are available. Robes, Medieval clothing, and colorful dress is welcomed, Please bring warmer over-clothing for the evening for around the fire as it may cool down.

~Feel free to bring an offering to our faerie altar, a coin, a stone, a flower, whatever you would like,
as Beltaine is also a time for fairies :)

~Send energy for low temperatures, cloudy skies,
as this will decrease the may-fly population....
If you have it, bring bug repellent just in case, and do not wear any sweet perfumes as it attracts the flys.

~Drinking is allowed for those who are of age,
however, driving while drunk will not be condoned.
If you plan in indulging, plan on staying....

You can feel free to camp out, and if you would like to "sack out" in the house, please let us know upon rsvp and bring your sleeping bags. Please let us know asap as room is very limited at

~Please RSVP if you are coming by
Thursday, May 1st, so that we can accurately
plan on how much food to buy for the celebration.

~Directions will be posted prior to Saturday


~Rain date will be Sunday, May 4th, please keep posted on the list email group

~For an questions you may email me at:
talawolf7@webtv.net

or call with any problems at:
(508) 847-7677

Come and help us Welcome in Spring!! :)
item.how_to_find_us: There will be directions coming before the Meet-Up
item.why: It is going to be an awesome Beltaine/Maypole ritual, with a cook-out, wicker man, and huge bonfire, with a group of awesome people, and wonderful energy! :)
item.name: Beltaine Maypole Celebration
